meanings.sent1: The zoosperms of the fish fertilized the eggs.

meanings.definition: Zoosperms: the male reproductive cells of animals, especially in aquatic organisms.
meanings.sent1: Aquatic organisms release zoosperms into the water to fertilize eggs.
meanings.sent2: The zoosperms of the sea creatures are essential for reproduction.
meanings.sent3: The zoosperms in the ocean had a party to celebrate their mission!
meanings.sent4: The zoosperms navigated through the water like tiny explorers.
meanings.sent5: The survival of the species depended on the successful journey of the zoosperms.
